models.author: LlamaIndex
models.description: vdr-2b-v1 is an english only embedding model designed for visual document retrieval. It encodes document page screenshots into dense single-vector representations, this will effectively allow to search and query visually rich multilingual documents without the need for any OCR, data extraction pipelines, and chunking.

models.author: LlamaIndex
models.description: vdr-2b-multi-v1 is a multilingual embedding model designed for visual document retrieval across multiple languages and domains. It encodes document page screenshots into dense single-vector representations, this will effectively allow to search and query visually rich multilingual documents without the need for any OCR, data extraction pipelines, and chunking.
